name: The Mondrian Principle
description:
The Mondrian Principle is a puzzle-platformer 3D game, in the third person view, where a small robot needs to surpass several colored mazes in order to prove that he is more than a robot. The game presents a unique visual approach - based on the Mondrian paintings and the use of bold colors.

This project is a prototype developed for the Digital Games class at FEUP, and any feedback is welcomed.
